roleset.name: like a bird

example.name: nicely inverted syntax
example.text: Below in the open bay facing Manhattan was Staten Island, gritty with clam shells and mud flats behind which nested [*T*] farms, cattle barns, and berry thickets.
example.arg: Island, gritty with clam shells and mud flats
farms, cattle barns, and berry thickets.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Simon Chang notes that a major innovation usually is nested in a lot of small innovations .
example.arg: in a lot of small innovations

example.name: pseudopassive/adjectival
example.text: Next, the hen was nested [*]and all seemed well.

roleset.note: NEST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nest' based on sentences in brown. (from nest.01-v predicate notes)
